Testimonial

Our great testimonial from everyone.

Aanya Srisai

My journey at the Faculty of Communication Arts was transformative. The comprehensive curriculum and hands-on experience helped me cultivate the skills I needed to navigate the fast-paced world of fashion and media. The professors encouraged creativity and out-of-the-box thinking, which allowed me to pursue my dreams fearlessly. Today, as a brand ambassador for both Gucci and Dior, I continuously draw on the lessons I learned at university—whether it’s crafting compelling narratives, building authentic connections, or staying ahead in a constantly evolving industry. I owe so much of my success to the strong foundation I built here.

Testimonials

Each testimonial highlights the unique experiences and opportunities they encountered during their time at the university.
From groundbreaking projects to invaluable connections, our alumni share how their education has shaped their paths

Maria Smantha

Studying at the Business Faculty (BUSEM) has been a life-changing experience for me. The rigorous curriculum not only equipped me with essential business skills but also encouraged me to think critically and strategically. The professors were incredibly supportive, guiding us through real-world challenges and helping us develop our leadership abilities.

Lisa Cudrow

Studying Hotel Management has been a rewarding journey. The curriculum combined theory with practical experiences, allowing me to develop essential skills in hospitality and customer service. The faculty’s industry insights and the chance to participate in internships provided me with a solid foundation. I’m grateful for the connections I made and the confidence I gained.

John Smith

My time at the Computer Science program has been transformative. The hands-on learning and innovative projects sharpened my technical skills and problem-solving abilities. Supportive faculty and collaborative peers created an inspiring environment that fueled my passion for technology. Thanks to the strong foundation I gained here, I feel prepared to tackle real-world challenges.
